level.heading: Appeal from District of Columbia Court of Appeals; filing, form and contents of petition; procedure, generally, on appeal from District of Columbia Court of Appeals; record; rules of court; time for petitioning for allowance of appeal from District of Columbia Court of Appeals; determination of appeal from District of Columbia Court of Appeals.
Miscellaneous Notes
level.text: Section 29 of D.C. Law 15-354 provides that Title 17 is designated Title 17 of the District of Columbia Official Code.
